All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractFetchShuffleBlocks
Base class for fetch shuffle blocks and chunks.
AppsWithRecoveryDisabled
Stores the applications which have recovery disabled.
BlockFetchingListener
 
BlockPushingListener
Callback to handle block push success and failure.
BlockPushReturnCode
Error code indicating a non-fatal failure of a block push request.
BlocksRemoved
The reply to remove blocks giving back the number of removed blocks.
BlockStoreClient
Provides an interface for reading both shuffle files and RDD blocks, either from an Executor or external service.
BlockTransferListener
This interface unifies both BlockFetchingListener and BlockPushingListener under a single interface to allow code reuse, while also keeping the existing public interface to facilitate backward compatibility.
BlockTransferMessage
Messages handled by the ExternalBlockHandler, or by Spark's NettyBlockTransferService.
BlockTransferMessage.Decoder
 
BlockTransferMessage.Type
Preceding every serialized message is its type, which allows us to deserialize it.
Cause
The cause of shuffle data corruption.
Constants
 
CorruptionCause
Response to the DiagnoseCorruption
DiagnoseCorruption
Request to get the cause of a corrupted block.
DownloadFile
A handle on the file used when fetching remote data to disk.
DownloadFileManager
A manager to create temp block files used when fetching remote data to reduce the memory usage.
DownloadFileWritableChannel
A channel for writing data which is fetched to disk, which allows access to the written data only after the writer has been closed.
ErrorHandler
Plugs into RetryingBlockTransferor to further control when an exception should be retried and logged.
ErrorHandler.BlockFetchErrorHandler
 
ErrorHandler.BlockPushErrorHandler
The error handler for pushing shuffle blocks to remote shuffle services.
ExecutorDiskUtils
 
ExecutorShuffleInfo
Contains all configuration necessary for locating the shuffle files of an executor.
ExternalBlockHandler
RPC Handler for a server which can serve both RDD blocks and shuffle blocks from outside of an Executor process.
ExternalBlockStoreClient
Client for reading both RDD blocks and shuffle blocks which points to an external (outside of executor) server.
ExternalShuffleBlockResolver
Manages converting shuffle BlockIds into physical segments of local files, from a process outside of Executors.
ExternalShuffleBlockResolver.AppExecId
Simply encodes an executor's full ID, which is appId + execId.
FetchShuffleBlockChunks
Request to read a set of block chunks.
FetchShuffleBlocks
Request to read a set of blocks.
FinalizeShuffleMerge
Request to finalize merge for a given shuffle.
GetLocalDirsForExecutors
Request to get the local dirs for the given executors.
LocalDirsForExecutors
The reply to get local dirs giving back the dirs for each of the requested executors.
MergedBlockMeta
Contains meta information for a merged block.
MergedBlocksMetaListener
Listener for receiving success or failure events when fetching meta of merged blocks.
MergedShuffleFileManager
The MergedShuffleFileManager is used to process push based shuffle when enabled.
MergeFinalizerListener
:: DeveloperApi :: Listener providing a callback function to invoke when driver receives the response for the finalize shuffle merge request sent to remote shuffle service.
MergeStatuses
Result returned by an ExternalShuffleService to the DAGScheduler.
NoOpMergedShuffleFileManager
Dummy implementation of merged shuffle file manager.
OneForOneBlockFetcher
Simple wrapper on top of a TransportClient which interprets each chunk as a whole block, and invokes the BlockFetchingListener appropriately.
OneForOneBlockPusher
Similar to OneForOneBlockFetcher, but for pushing blocks to remote shuffle service to be merged instead of for fetching them from remote shuffle services.
OpenBlocks
Request to read a set of blocks.
PushBlockStream
Request to push a block to a remote shuffle service to be merged in push based shuffle.
RegisterExecutor
Initial registration message between an executor and its local shuffle server.
RemoteBlockPushResolver
An implementation of MergedShuffleFileManager that provides the most essential shuffle service processing logic to support push based shuffle.
RemoteBlockPushResolver.AppAttemptId
Encodes an application attempt ID.
RemoteBlockPushResolver.AppAttemptShuffleMergeId
Encodes an application attempt shuffle merge ID.
RemoteBlockPushResolver.AppPathsInfo
Wraps all the information related to the merge directory of an application.
RemoteBlockPushResolver.AppShuffleInfo
Merged Shuffle related information tracked for a specific application attempt
RemoteBlockPushResolver.AppShuffleMergePartitionsInfo
Wrapper class to hold merged Shuffle related information for a specific shuffleMergeId required for the shuffles of indeterminate stages.
RemoteBlockPushResolver.AppShufflePartitionInfo
Metadata tracked for an actively merged shuffle partition
RemoteBlockPushResolver.MergeShuffleFile
 
RemoveBlocks
Request to remove a set of blocks.
RemoveShuffleMerge
Remove the merged data for a given shuffle.
RetryingBlockTransferor
Wraps another BlockFetcher or BlockPusher with the ability to automatically retry block transfers which fail due to IOExceptions, which we hope are due to transient network conditions.
RetryingBlockTransferor.BlockTransferStarter
Used to initiate the first transfer for all blocks, and subsequently for retrying the transfer on any remaining blocks.
ShuffleChecksumHelper
A set of utility functions for the shuffle checksum.
ShuffleIndexInformation
Keeps the index information for a particular map output as an in-memory LongBuffer.
ShuffleIndexRecord
Contains offset and length of the shuffle block data.
ShuffleSecretManager
A class that manages shuffle secret used by the external shuffle service.
ShuffleTransportContext
Extends TransportContext to support customized shuffle service.
SimpleDownloadFile
A DownloadFile that does not take any encryption settings into account for reading and writing data.
StreamHandle
Identifier for a fixed number of chunks to read from a stream created by an "open blocks" message.
UploadBlock
Request to upload a block with a certain StorageLevel.
UploadBlockStream
A request to Upload a block, which the destination should receive as a stream.
